# Urban Explorer
## Overview
*Urban Explorer (Ex):* You can use the [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] skill to avoid getting lost in an urban environment or settlement. You can use this ability even if you have never visited the settlement before. 

**Source:** Class Acts: Rogues (Abandoned Arts), pg. 3
